<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## entries() function

返回键值对的迭代器。

支持普通对象、Map 和 Set：- 对于对象：返回自身可枚举的字符串键值对 - 对于 Map：返回 \[key, value\] 对 - 对于 Set：返回 \[value, value\] 对

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function entries<T extends Map<any, any> | Set<any> | Record<Key, any>>(
  obj: T,
): EntriesResult<T>;
```

## Example

```ts
[...entries({ a: 1, b: "2", c: true })]
// [["a", 1], ["b", "2"], ["c", true]]

[...entries(new Map([["a", 1], ["b", 2]]))]
// [["a", 1], ["b", 2]]

[...entries(new Set([1, 2, 3]))]
// [[1, 1], [2, 2], [3, 3]]
```

see [fromEntries](https://fxts.dev/docs/fromEntries)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/entries.ts)
